name: ASTEROIDS ULTIMATE DELUXE(Beta 2!!!)
description:
Hello! This is my first game, made for training my abilities!

New in Beta 2:

1)Improved sound and graphics effects!!!

2)Fixed many minor(and critical) bugs!!

If I get a good feedback, I will continue to develop and you will be able to see a lot more cool!

In my plans:

1) New game modes

2)New graphic styles

3)More options

4)Upgrades

5)Power-ups and much more....!

So if you downloaded this game please write how I could improve it:)

Controls: UP/LEFT/RIGHT Arrows - Move

Space - shoot
